author: lukaszrozmej
content:
Is anyone apart from Geth serving snap sync data now?
We will be merging soon: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/6722 and probably releasing it some time after cancun. We still don't have best layout for it but it is good enough to be enabled. We are still working on hopefully better layouts

content: are you guys running the snap protocol tests?
